parameter.name: filter
parameter.description: The name or ID of the filter to be used.

parameter.name: user
parameter.description: The username or ID of the user to be filtered.

parameter.name: page
parameter.description: The page number to return tickets for.

parameter.name: sortBy
parameter.description: The name of the field to sort results.

parameter.name: orderBy
parameter.description: One of the asc or desc types for the sorting order.

parameter.name: conditions
parameter.description: The additional conditions which will be added to the filter query.

parameter.name: isRawTicket
parameter.description: The flag to retrieve full ticket information.
